column_description: The unique identifier of the
Timestamp of when a record was last synced.
Boolean identifiying whether the record was deleted in the source.
The id of the account associated with this order.
The id of the contact associated with the billing address for this order.
The category of the order, such as NewSubscription or Amendment.
The id of the user who created this order.
The date and time when this order was created.
The id of the default payment method used for this order.
A brief description of this order.
The error code associated with this order, if any.
The error message associated with this order, if any.
The date and time when this order was placed.
The unique identifier for this order.
The response associated with this order, if any.
The date and time when this order is scheduled to be processed.
The id of the contact associated with the shipping address for this order.
The state of this order, such as Draft or Processing.
The status of this order, such as Pending or Completed.
The id of the user who last updated this order.
The date and time when this order was last updated.
